attributes.action: Take action against every social/council worker involved in the baby P case, not only should they resign but be prosecuted to the full extent to the law for their failings!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my opinion that anyone who has a child of there own will feel that not enough action was taken to proctect this poor baby.If it is true that social services made 60 visits to see this child and did not take any action then they should hang there heads in shame. I understand that the main villans where the mother, boyfriend and lodger, but that does not excuse the failings of the council.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
